text: Ecuador participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Ecuador squad consisted of 14 athletes competing in 8 sports: aquatics (swimming), athletics, boxing, table tennis, tennis, triathlon, weightlifting and wrestling.http://www.ecuadorcoe.org.ec/htm/Presenta_Boletin.asp?cod=6334&CurPage;=1 ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
